name: dfs.client.read.shortcircuit.streams.cache.expiry.ms
description:
This controls the minimum amount of time
    file descriptors need to sit in the client cache context
    before they can be closed for being inactive for too long.

name: dfs.namenode.resource.checked.volumes.minimum
description: The minimum number of redundant NameNode storage volumes required.

name: dfs.namenode.path.based.cache.refresh.interval.ms
description:
The amount of milliseconds between subsequent path cache rescans.  Path
    cache rescans are when we calculate which blocks should be cached, and on
    what datanodes.

    By default, this parameter is set to 30 seconds.

name: dfs.namenode.name.cache.threshold
description:
Frequently accessed files that are accessed more times than this
    threshold are cached in the FSDirectory nameCache.

name: dfs.datanode.min.outlier.detection.nodes
description: Minimum number of nodes to run outlier detection.

name: dfs.namenode.edekcacheloader.initial.delay.ms
description:
When KeyProvider is configured, the time delayed until the first
    attempt to warm up edek cache on NN start up / become active.

name: io.file.buffer.size
description:
The size of buffer for use in sequence files.
  The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware
  page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is
  buffered during read and write operations.

name: dfs.namenode.snapshot.skiplist.max.levels
description:
Maximum no of the skip levels to be maintained in the skip list for
    storing directory snapshot diffs. By default, it is set to 0 and a linear
    list will be used to store the directory snapshot diffs.
